answers.text:
We use a variation of the "Best Year Yet" approach to goal-setting . . .

answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Shannon, 
There is a Guide to Planning and Conducting Successful Retreats from the Institute for Public Service and Policy Research at the University of South Carolina that you may find useful as you put your retreat together. icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/11478
You might also be interested in the council retreat ground rules provided by Shoreline, WA that encourage council members to focus on policy instead of process and keep retreats on track. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3488/Council_Retreat_Ground_Rules
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Shannon Delaney
text:

Thank You!
title: City Council Retreat
